//: Generic Mercenary Guard for the ancilla hq.

yes: Make sure you don't get in trouble, officer.
Don't let me see you snooping around.
How do you like that boot, huh?

yes.gendered_line: &The mercenary looks noticeably tense as you approach.

yes: Great to see you back in base.
Heres hoping I get out of guard duty soon.
On an errand from the box?
Up for a drink when my shift ends?

Well I cant complain much, money and free food for standing around with a gun?

Sure looks like a steal nowadays.
If you don't have any business here, you better get going.
Terminal is down there, please move along.
Are you here to do anything?
no.no: If you are looking for the Terminal, it's in the first basement, right down the stairs and to the left.

responses.text: Is there any way I can join your team?

dynamic_line:
Me?  Just standing around, looking scary.  Think I'm doing a good job?

Don't answer that.
Just making sure people don't ask stupid questions.
I'm just on watch, move along.
Getting paid for standing around.  And you are getting in the way.
A few of us joined up to make this a safe house, and it's just my turn watching the gates.
Just go down to the Terminal if you want in.
Well you certainly look like you could.  Try ringing the box in the bunker across the street, or see if someone in the Terminal has a need for help.
